mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NUM, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_BIRTH,USER_DDAY) VALUES(MEMBER_SEQ.nextVal, #{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_birth},#{user_dday})
mapper.select: select count(USER_ID) from member where USER_ID = #{user_id}
select * from member where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pwd=#{user_pwd}
mapper.update: update member set USER_MATCH = 1,USER_NOWMATCH = #{user_nowmatch},USER_ANSWER = 1 where user_num = #{user_num}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_phone, user_birth, user_couplenum, '20' || REPLACE(user_dday, '/', '-') AS user_dday, user_adate from member where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_id, count(*) cnt from member where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pwd=#{user_pwd} group by user_id
select user_id from member where user_name=#{user_name} and user_phone=#{user_phone}
